BonusSpellFeature.Name: Ring of Jumping
BonusSpellFeature.Text: While wearing this ring, you can cast the jump spell from it as a bonus action at will, but can target only yourself when you do so.

MagicProperty.Name: Ring of Jumping
MagicProperty.Description: While wearing this ring, you can cast the jump spell from it as a bonus action at will, but can target only yourself when you do so.
